definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

pinyin: tu2 xiang4 hu4 huan4 ge2 shi4

sentences.english: Once you open a page, it has formatting functions just as in word processor.
sentences.chinese: 每一個新頁面都有與文書處理機相同的格式化功能。

sentences.english: A file system must be unmounted to be reformatted.
sentences.chinese: 一個文件系統必須在被缷載後纔可以重新格式化。

sentences.english: There should definitely be no data formatting or parsing of non-standard formats.
sentences.chinese: 絕對不應對非標準格式進行數據格式化或解析。

sentences.english: There should definitely be no data formatting or parsing of non-standard formats.
sentences.chinese: 絕對不應對非標準格式進行數據格式化或解析。

sentences.english: In chapter 1, a difference scheme of some two-dimensional linear pseudo-parabolic equation is concerned.
sentences.chinese: 第一章中討論了二維線性僞拋物型方程的差分格式。

sentences.english: You can describe all of these formats with regular expressions.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些格式都可以用正則表達式來描述。

sentences.english: High-level security policies are documents in manual or digital format.
sentences.chinese: 高級安全策略是硬拷貝或數字格式的文檔。

sentences.english: Do I have to dump the microformatting?
sentences.chinese: 我是否必須轉儲微格式？

sentences.english: E-mail addresses can have several forms, even though there is a standard format.
sentences.chinese: 電子郵件地址有多種格式，但是有一種標準格式。

sentences.english: E-mail addresses can have several forms, even though there is a standard format.
sentences.chinese: 電子郵件地址有多種格式，但是有一種標準格式。

sentences.english: Raster-based data formats tend to behave much more like images.
sentences.chinese: 基於柵格的數據格式更類似於圖像。

sentences.english: It is a competing format to Dolby Digital which was released about a year after.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個稍後一年發佈具有競爭力的杜比數字格式。

sentences.english: All formats of files and documents should be consented by the customers and the third part before they are used.
sentences.chinese: 所有文件圖紙的格式應按用戶和第三方同意後使用。

sentences.english: For example, the dates are not harmonized in both systems.
sentences.chinese: 例如，兩個系統上的日期格式就不相同。

sentences.english: The other major innovation in this example is the use of formatted printing.
sentences.chinese: 本例中的另一項主要創新是使用了格式化打印。

sentences.english: The format of those pixels can differ, from video card to video card.
sentences.chinese: 象素點的格式會因顯卡的不同而不同。

definition: my (Internet slang variant of 我的[wo3 de5])
character set (e.g. ASCII 美國資訊交換標準碼|美国资讯交换标准码 or Unicode 統一碼|统一码)
